inclusion.criterion: Adult individual 18 yr. of age or older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitively intact and capable of giving informed consent.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of a non-penetrating traumatic SCI to the cervical spine
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, not a non-penetrating traumatic SCI.

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine.

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression as defined by WBC < 3,000 cells/ml at baseline screening.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having a contraindication to MRI scans
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Key unknowns include the patient's cognitive status and whether they have any other acute or chronic medical conditions that may increase the risks associated with study participation.
